page.title: 03Sheffield Works Department
page.content:
The{Works Department}is responsible for repairing and modernising council houses in the city of Sheffield.
The Eastern Area depot serves the Woodthorpe and Manor areas.The office had recently installed a computer connected to the Town Hall to receive details of repairs.There was a large store of things like roof tiles,bricks, baths, pipes and snow clearing vehicles.
The houses in the area around Woodthorpe and Manor are all being modernised at present. They are putting in new windows and doors ,new gas and electric metels ,new roofs, new inside walls. Some of the houses are too unsafe to repair because of the kind of mortar they used in houses just after the second world war.
